item.title: Colorado To Pay $1.5 Million For Violating Christian Resident’s Religious Freedoms
item.description: 'This is a win not just for me but for all Americans — for those who share my beliefs and for those who hold different views,' Lorie Smith said.

item.title: Michigan Democrats Pass Bills That Would Give Trans People Exclusive Legal Privileges When Accusing Others Of Violence
item.description: Republican state Sen. Jim Runestad expressed concern that prosecutors could politically weaponize the provisions in the bills.

item.title: Hovde’s Right: ‘Troubling Issues’ Dogged Milwaukee On Election Day
item.description: Swing state Wisconsin's largest city has a history of election administration messes that have eroded trust in Milwaukee's elections.

item.title: Republicans Must Defend Matt Gaetz To End The Use Of Salacious Lies As A Political Weapon
item.description: Conservatives need to defend Gaetz from discredited allegations to prevent this pattern from repeating.

item.title: Six Action Items Trump And A GOP Congress Should Pass To Secure Our Elections
item.description: Despite Trump's victory, there are still gaps in election law ripe for abuse by bad actors seeking to disrupt the electoral process.
